relation.text: 1786 My dearest Miſs Glover I take
last week & to day we go
some time with us ; she is happy in having a very amiable man for her husband , he is at present absent with Mrs .. Luxmore in Scotland . We are very gay here , about ten days ago
now on a visit to Miſs Anna Maria Bourdieu s
is settled & I have the money now
